import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import Category2 from'./Category2';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Categories2=()=>{const[categoryList,setCategoryList]=useState([]);const[selected,setSelected]=useState('All');useEffect(()=>{axios("data/category.json").then(res=>setCategoryList(res.data)).catch(error=>console.log(error));},[]);const handleSelected=name=>{setSelected(name);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"categories",children:categoryList&&categoryList.map(category=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Category2,{category:category,click:handleSelected,style:category.name===selected?//category.name 값을 사용하는 경우 타입정의!
'category category--selected':'category'})}))});};export default Categories2;
